name: Catastrophe (haren, Brictone)
description:
Play as Milton XIV and cause as much destruction as possible but don't get caught in the act by, Shrodinger!

Cause chaos in your confinements of your human captor, discover power ups all the while avoiding Shrodinger. If you get caught your free meals and comfy sleeping arrangements are no more, and out on the streets for you!  Shrodinger tolerates no nonsense.  Are you a good cat? or a bad cat? Or both until you are observed in this duality of a mystery for your human.
